org.apache.juneau.rest.annotation

Annotation Type Query

  • Deprecated. 
    Use Query

    @Deprecated
 @Documented
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
public @interface Query

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String def
      Deprecated. 
      The default value for this query parameter if it's not present in the request.
      boolean multipart
      Deprecated. 
      Specify true if using multi-part parameters to represent collections and arrays.
      String name
      Deprecated. 
      URL query parameter name.
      Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser
      Deprecated. 
      Specifies the HttpPartParser class used for parsing values from strings.
      String value
      Deprecated. 
      A synonym for name().

    • Element Detail

      • def

        public abstract String def
        Deprecated. 
        The default value for this query parameter if it's not present in the request.
        Default:
        ""

      • multipart

        public abstract boolean multipart
        Deprecated. 
        Specify true if using multi-part parameters to represent collections and arrays.

        Normally, we expect single parameters to be specified in UON notation for representing collections of values (e.g. "&key=(1,2,3)". This annotation allows the use of multi-part parameters to represent collections (e.g. "&key=1&key=2&key=3".

        This setting should only be applied to Java parameters of type array or Collection.

        Default:
        false

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Deprecated. 
        URL query parameter name.
        Default:
        ""

      • parser

        public abstract Class<? extends HttpPartParser> parser
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies the HttpPartParser class used for parsing values from strings.

        The default value for this parser is inherited from the servlet/method which defaults to UonPartParser.
        You can use SimplePartParser to parse POJOs that are directly convertible from Strings.

        Default:
        org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartParser.Null.class

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Deprecated. 
        A synonym for name().

        Allows you to use shortened notation if you're only specifying the name.

        Default:
        ""
